summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a Memorandum of Understanding between the City of Seattle and Automotive Machinists, Local No. 289; International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, Local No. 77 International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local No. 17; the Joint Crafts Council and the affiliates thereto; United Association of Jouneymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipefitting Industry, Local No. 32; and Washington State Council of County and City Employees, Local No. 21, as the representatives of certain City employees concerning the City Light Department Skagit Housing Program.
